name: Rule Cracker
description:
"Rule Cracker" is a pixel beat-em-up developed during UNIAT's Game Summit 2022. The theme for this year's event was "Break the Rules" so our team, Migrant Ideas Jr., decided to develope a concept that literally follows the theme by having a school student to break the rule(rs) by hitting their classmates but without getting caught by their professors.
